abstract: Police question scores of people in Senegal as part of extra security measures being taken in wake of terrorist attacks in Burkina Faso and Mali.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Senegal: Vigilant Police Cast a Wide Net
headline.main: Senegal: Vigilant Police Cast a Wide Net

snippet: The police had questioned about 900 people over the past few days as part of a heightened security operation after terrorist attacks in Burkina Faso and Mali.
lead_paragraph: The police had questioned about 900 people over the past few days as part of a heightened security operation after terrorist attacks in Burkina Faso and Mali.
